languages.text: "Давайте мы вам расскажем, где на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — ну вы знаете Футфол, единственная верфь и лучший рынок {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}! — так вот, расскажем, где на Футфоле есть очень серьезные деловые люди, и как с тех людей получить скидку на очень особые товары".

traits.locale_text: "Давайте мы вам расскажем, где на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — ну вы знаете Футфол, единственная верфь и лучший рынок {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}! — так вот, расскажем, где на Футфоле есть очень серьезные деловые люди, и как с тех людей получить скидку на очень особые товары".

languages.text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"
languages.original_text: "Давайте мы вам расскажем, где на станции {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Футфол{/g} — ну вы знаете Футфол, единственная верфь и лучший рынок {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}! — так вот, расскажем, где на Футфоле есть очень серьезные деловые люди, и как с тех людей получить скидку на очень особые товары".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a good deal on some very special goods."

"Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a good deal on some very special goods."

"Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

"Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

languages.text: «¿Y si le decimos dónde puede buscar en la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}estación de Paso{/g}...? Conoce Paso, ¿verdad? El único astillero y el mejor mercado de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, bien, pues... ¿y si le decimos dónde puede buscar a personas muy serias que hacen negocios en Paso, y cómo conseguir que le ofrezcan un descuento bastante especial en productos bastante especiales?».
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y si le decimos dónde puede buscar en la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}estación de Paso{/g}...? Conoce Paso, ¿verdad? El único astillero y el mejor mercado de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, bien, pues... ¿y si le decimos dónde puede buscar a personas muy serias que hacen negocios en Paso, y cómo conseguir que le ofrezcan un descuento bastante especial en productos bastante especiales?».

languages.text: "Warum erzählen wir Euch nicht, wo man auf der {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Station Footfall{/g} — Ihr kennt doch Footfall, die einzige Werft und den besten Markt in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}? — ja, also ... wo auf Footfall man seriöse Geschäftsleute findet und wie man von ihnen einen ganz speziellen Rabatt auf ganz spezielle Waren bekommen kann?"
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum erzählen wir Euch nicht, wo man auf der {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Station Footfall{/g} — Ihr kennt doch Footfall, die einzige Werft und den besten Markt in der gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}? — ja, also ... wo auf Footfall man seriöse Geschäftsleute findet und wie man von ihnen einen ganz speziellen Rabatt auf ganz spezielle Waren bekommen kann?"

languages.text: « Et si on vous disait où dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}station Castel{/g} — vous savez, Castel : le seul chantier de réparations et le meilleur marché de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}... Oui, donc, si on vous disait où à Castel vous pouvez trouver des gens très intéressés par les affaires et très sérieux, et comment faire pour obtenir un joli rabais de leur part pour des marchandises très spéciales ? »
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: « Et si on vous disait où dans la {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}station Castel{/g} — vous savez, Castel : le seul chantier de réparations et le meilleur marché de toutes les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}... Oui, donc, si on vous disait où à Castel vous pouvez trouver des gens très intéressés par les affaires et très sérieux, et comment faire pour obtenir un joli rabais de leur part pour des marchandises très spéciales ? »

languages.text: “这么说吧，在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港星站{/g}……您应该知道落脚港吧？那是整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}唯一的船坞，也是最大的市场，您是知道的吧？我可以给您指路，帮您在落脚港找到一群非常正经的生意人，还可以帮您谈个好价钱，帮您弄到别地方弄不到的好货。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: “这么说吧，在{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}落脚港星站{/g}……您应该知道落脚港吧？那是整个{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯星域{/g}唯一的船坞，也是最大的市场，您是知道的吧？我可以给您指路，帮您在落脚港找到一群非常正经的生意人，还可以帮您谈个好价钱，帮您弄到别地方弄不到的好货。”

languages.text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}の、ある場所を教えるってのはどうだ？フットフォールは、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で唯一の造船所と、最高の市場がある場所だ。そう、そして…フットフォールにはえらく真面目で商売熱心な連中がいて、そいつらからは特別な商品を特別割引価格で購入できる。その場所がどこか、教えてやろうか？」
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: 「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}の場所を教えるのはどうだ？フットフォールはほら、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で唯一の造船所で、一番の取引所だ。そう、それで…フットフォールで特別ビジネスに乗り気な人間のいる場所、そして特別な商品を特別割引で購入する方法を教えよう」

「{g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}フットフォール・ステーション{/g}の、ある場所を教えるってのはどうだ？フットフォールは、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}で唯一の造船所と、最高の市場がある場所だ。そう、そして…フットフォールにはえらく真面目で商売熱心な連中がいて、そいつらからは特別な商品を特別割引価格で購入できる。その場所がどこか、教えてやろうか？」

languages.text: "Size... {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman İstasyonu{/g} var ya hani, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ndeki{/g} tek tersane ve en iyi pazar olan, hah işte Binliman'daki kerli ferli, ticari zekâlı insanları nerede bulabileceğinizi ve onlardan bazı çok özel mallarda nasıl çok özel bir indirim alabileceğinizi söylesek?"
languages.original_text: "Why don't we tell you where on {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Footfall Station{/g} — you know Footfall, the only shipyard and the best market in all the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} — yes, so... where on Footfall you can find some very serious, business-minded people, and how you can get yourself a very special discount from them on some very special goods?"

traits.locale_text: "Size... {g|Encyclopedia:Footfall}Binliman İstasyonu{/g} var ya hani, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ndeki tek tersane ve en iyi pazar olan, hah işte Binliman'daki kerli ferli, ticari zekâlı insanları nerede bulabileceğinizi ve onlardan bazı çok özel mallarda nasıl çok özel bir indirim alabileceğinizi söylesek?"
